pr_title: Add errorprone check for immutables style collisions

timeline.bodyText: I think we can use describeMatch instead which inherits the summary message from the class-level BugPattern annotation.
timeline.author: carterkozak

timeline.bodyText: Please document this alongside the other baseline error-prone checks in the readme!
timeline.author: carterkozak

replies.bodyText: You'll also need to add it to the list of errorprone rules we always apply
replies.author: ferozco

replies.bodyText: I added it to the readme but where is the list @ferozco ?
replies.author: a10y

replies.bodyText: I think that's just for automatic refactors, but this can't be auto-fixed. severity = BugPattern.SeverityLevel.ERROR, should be sufficient.
replies.author: carterkozak
